cancel_terminate_issuance.TITLE: Cancel or Terminate Issue
cancel_terminate_issuance.DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Enter Full Message to Investor here
cancel_terminate_issuance.SUBMIT_DESCRIPTION: The following messages will appear to Investors on the platform and be sent to them by email - do you want to proceed?

adjust_bid.ADJUST_BID_SUCCESS: The bid has been successfully adjusted
adjust_bid.REMOVE_BID_SUCCESS: The bid has been successfully removed

remove_bidder.REMOVE_BIDDER_SUCCESS: The bidder has been successfully removed

errors.REQUIRED_CREDIT_LIMIT: all investor organizations must have a credit limit
errors.IS_MATCH_COMMENCING_ON: CommencingOn must be equal any InterestPaymentDates
errors.DTC_NUMBER_MIN: dtc number should be minimum 4 digits
